com.ultracast.player

Interface UC360Player.EventListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    UC360Player

    public static interface UC360Player.EventListener
    Listener of changes in player state.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onMotionControlNotSupported()
      Called after init() if current device doesn’t support motion control
      void onPlayerClick()
      Called when user click on the player
      void onPlayerError(int errorCode)
      Called when an error occurs.
      void onPlayerStateChanged(boolean playWhenReady, int playbackState) 

    • Method Detail

      • onPlayerStateChanged

        void onPlayerStateChanged(boolean playWhenReady,
                          int playbackState)
        Parameters:
        playWhenReady - Whether playback will proceed when ready.
        playbackState - One of the constants defined in the UC360Player interface.
        See Also:
        UC360Player.STATE_IDLE, UC360Player.STATE_BUFFERING, UC360Player.STATE_READY, UC360Player.STATE_ENDED

      • onPlayerError

        void onPlayerError(int errorCode)
        Called when an error occurs.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - The error code
        See Also:
        UC360Player.TYPE_SOURCE, UC360Player.TYPE_DEVICE_NOT_SUPPORTED, UC360Player.TYPE_UNEXPECTED

      • onMotionControlNotSupported
